title: The Favorites - NBA Finals Betting Guide
itunes:title: The Favorites - NBA Finals Betting Guide
description:
It all comes down to this! The long grind has delivered gamblers a great NBA Finals matchup, with the favored Golden State Warriors facing the underdog Boston Celtics. With Game 1 looming on Thursday night, Action Network host Chad Millman and his professional gambler best friend Simon Hunter welcome Action NBA senior writer Matt Moore and betting expert Chris Raybon to the program to break it all down. What are the best ways to bet Game 1? Are the Celtics worth a shot at the current series price? What Finals MVP longshots are worth grabbing? All this and so much more as the last games of the NBA tipoff this week. #Herd
